
include(ExternalProject)

ExternalProject_Add(freetype_project
    SOURCE_DIR ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/3rdParty/freetype
    CMAKE_CACHE_ARGS "-DFT_DISABLE_ZLIB:BOOL=TRUE"
		"-DFT_DISABLE_BZIP2:BOOL=TRUE"
		"-DFT_DISABLE_PNG:BOOL=TRUE" 
		"-DFT_DISABLE_HARFBUZZ:BOOL=TRUE"
		"-DFT_DISABLE_BROTLI:BOOL=TRUE"
	CMAKE_ARGS -DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX:PATH=${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/deps
    INSTALL_DIR ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/deps
)
